description.short: Whether in a state military or tasked with defending a community, you have spent a significant portion of time risking your life to defend others.
description.value:
Whether in a state military or tasked with defending a community, you have spent a significant portion of time risking your life to defend others. Surviving such dangerous work demands rigorous training, discipline, and sacrificing comforts that most people take for granted.

Perhaps you are a veteran searching for a new purpose, a deserter running from the atrocities of war, or a fresh-faced patriot pursuing new ways to fight for your cause. Whatever course you took, you forever bear the weight of duty.
